meanings.definition: Required to be reported or capable of being reported.
meanings.sent1: The incident was reportable to the authorities.
meanings.sent2: The company's financial data is reportable to shareholders.
meanings.sent3: It's important to make sure all reportable information is accurate.
meanings.sent4: The reportable details were carefully documented for future reference.
meanings.sent5: The reportable nature of the situation made it impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Worthy of being reported or deserving to be reported.
meanings.sent1: The discovery was reportable due to its significance.
meanings.sent2: Her achievements were reportable in the local newspaper.
meanings.sent3: Even the smallest victories can be reportable and celebrated.
meanings.sent4: The reportable story touched the hearts of many readers.
meanings.sent5: The reportable event left a lasting impact on the community.
